text: William Stanley Zmitrowicz Jr. (born May 16, 1947), known professionally as Bill Smitrovich, is an American actor. He was born in Bridgeport, Connecticut. Smitrovich is known for playing many military roles. These include Independence Day (1996), Air Force One (1997), Thirteen Days (2000), Fail Safe (2000), and Eagle Eye (2008). ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:People from Bridgeport, Connecticut
title: Bill Smitrovich
